Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I've not been on here for a few weeks, trying to cope with my first 2 ECs. Hoping to catch up with everyone again. Cycle 3 hopefully 20th December, unless it is delayed by neutropenia like cycle 2 was...I hope I'm OK for Christmas as I think I will have a meltdown if I have to spend Christmas in hospital!
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: In bed watching telly at home after lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsies today. Sooooo tired....zzzzzzz
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy & sentinel node biopsy - tick

Posts.Content: Wondering if I could tap into experiences re HRT and breast cancer. My little squatter is triple negative, so do you think this means that I might be ok to continue on HR?  I had a total hysterectomy a few years back due to family history of breast and ovarian cancer, and have been on HRT since then, but as my breast cancer is not hormone recaptive,  I was wondering if it's likely they will say it's OK to keep using it or not....
Posts.Title: Question about HRT

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I am currently waiting for the results of biopsies  taken on Wednesday from an 8mm lump found during my yearly mammogram. A sample was also taken from a slightly enlarged lymph node too. I have a family history of ovarian and breast cancer which is why I am having yearly mammograms at age 46, but I am freaking out somewhat. I feel like I have been waiting for this to happen actually. Me and my sisters have had hysterectomies due to the ovarian risk, but I feel like the clock has been ticking and that the big c would get me sometime soon, (my mum died when she was only 50 from ovarian cancer)...this year is 30 years since she died...sorry, feeling quite negative about it right now...
Posts.Title: Waiting......

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,  If you're looking at having to have chemo, whenjoy is the best time to get one. For me, I'm guessing not immediately as I have surgery scheduled for Thursday?  And should I also try and get my family immunised as well? Thank you!
Posts.Title: Flu jabs - timing and family as well?

Posts.Content: Hi NiceCuppa, Definitely get it checked out with your nurse, but if it helps at all, I felt pretty similar with my lymph node surgery area and I still don't think my arm sits flat against that area. I wonder whether this is fairly common. Regarding the pain, maybe there's something stronger you can take, but again your nurse should be able to advise. Also were you given a little heart shaped pillow to wedge under your affected arm? Mine is a godsend and I am still using it at night over 2 weeks later. Xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy, LICAP and lymphnodes removed. Is this swellling norma...

Posts.Content: I hope your nurse can help if only to reassure and/or get you some stronger pain killers. Xxxx
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy, LICAP and lymphnodes removed. Is this swellling norma...

Posts.Content: ....starting chemo on Thursday and I am mega stressed to the extreme. Work today has been absolutely crazy and stressful, and I can't see it getting better any time soon.... Trying to say to myself that it will be much better once I get the first one under my belt and I can gauge a bit better what side effects I will get..... Still got butterflies.....
Posts.Title: So anxious....

Posts.Content: Thanks for the replies. maggiemee, welling up with your comments for some reason!! Don't know why?!!! I phoned the hospital today to ask about the picc line and was told that 1 hadn't been arranged. I told them that my veins are very hard to find so picc line going in on Wednesday prior to chemo on Thursday.  Xxxx
Posts.Title: So anxious....

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,  I have results back from ki67 and am trying to get a sense of what this actually means. I've been told it was grade 3 but that the ki67 would show the degree of aggressiveness and whether it's borderline grade 2 or not. Well I've been told it was 20-25% and from what I've seen on the Internet that is defined as "high" with 20% borderline. Regardless, I'm having chemotherapy,  it doesn't change anything treatment wise I know, I'm just interested. Xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Anyone know about ki67 test?
